long_description: Hearty, instant beef stew with potatoes, onions, carrots and peas. Mix ingredients in the pouch provided with boiling water, let stand for a few minutes, and then serve. Quick and filling dinner for camping and backpacking. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Hearty, instant beef stew with potatoes, onions, carrots and peas.
